traits.name: Built to Destroy
traits.description:
Lower the number needed for a crit by 1. stacks
Condition decays 2x faster

traits.name: Jinxed
traits.description:
More critical failures for everyone around you (crit fail range raised by 3 {stackable by players who have taken this trait})
More critical failures for you, too

background.name: Unlucky Bastard
background.description:
By sheer neglect of Fate or an immeasurable chain of events you have survived this long, and nobody has put a bullet in the back of your head.
Skill bonus: Survival +5, Unarmed +5
Equipment: Bum Raggs and a shovel
Feature: Homeless by choice 
The critical fail range for those around you and yourself is increased by 1.
